description: Micro-habit tracker focused on 2-minute habits that build streaks through tiny wins. Adaptive difficulty adjustment based on completion patterns. Anti-perfectionism design that celebrates partial completion.
target_user: People who have tried and abandoned habit trackers, seeking sustainable behavior change without overwhelm
core_loop: Add one micro-habit (max 2 minutes to complete)
Morning check-in shows today's tiny goal
Mark complete or partial (both count toward streak)
See micro-win celebration and streak progress
Weekly adaptive adjustment based on completion rate
